l10n.description: Creator Tools allow you to do magics with HUD, camera and much more.

text.name: input_CT_FOVY_DEFAULT
text.text: Set the camera FOV to default value

text.name: input_CT_FOVY_DEFAULT_2
text.text: Set the camera FOV to default value

text.name: input_CT_CAMY_DEFAULT
text.text: Set the camera height to default value

text.name: input_CT_CAMY_DEFAULT_2
text.text: Set the camera height to default value

text.name: ui_CT_ADMIN_ONLY_ACTION
text.text: This action can be done only by admins, please do login to keep going

text.name: ui_CT_HUD_TOOLTIP
text.text: Hides or shows the heads-up displays (HUDs).

text.name: ui_CT_CREATIVE_MONEY_TOOLTIP
text.text: Enables or disables money cheat (one billion).

text.name: ui_CT_SHOW_BUTTONS_HELP_TOOLTIP
text.text: Enables or disables buttons help in the help box.

text.name: ui_CT_MUSCLES_MODE_TOOLTIP
text.text: With muscles mode, you can lift objects of any weight.

text.name: ui_CT_SHOW_REALCLOCK_TOOLTIP
text.text: Hides or shows the real clock.

text.name: ui_CT_SHOW_GOLD_NUGGETS_TOOLTIP
text.text: Hides or shows the gold nuggets on map.

text.name: ui_CT_setFieldFruitPloughingState_tooltip
text.text: The field will be considered as it have been plowed and will get a 10% bonus production for the next three crops.

text.name: ui_CT_setFieldFruitBuyField_tooltip
text.text: If you don't own this field, it will become yours at no additional cost.

text.name: ui_CT_setFieldGroudAngle_tooltip
text.text: The rotation angle of the terrain texture.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_00_00
text.text: As the name says, this mod is meant for creators (e.g. streamers and videomakers) but is also useful for common players that needs extra tools.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_00_01
text.text: The main features are listed and explained here, you can open the mod panel with the $input_CT_OPEN_PANEL_V2;.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_01_00
text.text: You can hide and show the HUDs (heads-up displays) with the $input_CT_HUD_TOGGLE;.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_02_00
text.text: You can increase and decrease the player speed with the $input_AXIS_CT_WALKING_SPEED;.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_02_01
text.text: You can also set the default player speed with the $input_CT_WALKING_SPEED_DEFAULT;.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_03_00
text.text: You can increase and decrease the camera height with the $input_AXIS_CT_CAMY; or with $input_CT_CAMY_UP; and $input_CT_CAMY_DOWN;.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_03_01
text.text: You can also set the default camera height with the $input_CT_CAMY_DEFAULT; or with $input_CT_CAMY_DEFAULT_2;.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_04_00
text.text: You can increase and decrease the camera zoom with the $input_AXIS_CT_FOVY; or with $input_CT_FOVY_UP; and $input_CT_FOVY_DOWN;.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_04_01
text.text: You can also set the default camera zoom with the $input_CT_FOVY_DEFAULT; or with $input_CT_FOVY_DEFAULT_2;.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_05_00
text.text: When you are on a vehicle, you can set his dirt amount with the $input_CT_CHANGE_DIRT;.

text.name: hl_CT_TEXT_06_00
text.text: This mod adds seven new time scales (from 240x to 15360x), you can set them with the $input_INCREASE_TIMESCALE; and $input_DECREASE_TIMESCALE;.
